attributes.action: Remove South Africa from the red list of countries entering England.
attributes.additional_details:
Over the last seven days there has been a 2,2% decrease in new cases which is a very slow reduction. Admission to hospitals reduced by 0,7% to 13 600 yesterday, small but welcome.
Over the last seven days hospitalization reduced by 3,3%.
New cases reduced by 2,2% again small but welcome.
The total number of people fully vaccinated either with one dose of J&J or two doses of Pfizer is now 5,450 million which is 850000 more than last week.
attributes.background:
The FCDO advises against all but essential travel to the whole of South Africa based on the current assessment of COVID-19 risks. 
South Africa is on the red list for entering England. The USA donated  2,2m doses of the Pfizer vaccines adding to the 5,6m donated in July.
